measurement_conditions: Cold start on an SSD meeting recommended hardware specs (REQ-1-077).
load_profile: Single user, no other system load.
monitoring_tools: Performance Profiler, Stopwatch timing in test script
improvement_opportunities: Review DI container registrations, lazy load non-critical components.
business_relevance: First impression of application responsiveness for the user.

measurement_conditions: Sustained load from 10 simultaneous C-STORE SCU clients sending studies (REQ-1-078).
load_profile: 10 concurrent DICOM SCUs, each sending a 100MB study.
monitoring_tools: JMeter (custom DICOM plugin) or custom C# test harness, RabbitMQ Management UI, System resource monitor (CPU/RAM).
improvement_opportunities: Optimize message serialization, tune RabbitMQ consumer prefetch count.
business_relevance: Ensures the system can handle load from multiple modalities in a clinical setting without data loss or delays.
